thread.title: Excellent Hotel for price charged.
thread.title_full: Excellent Hotel for price charged. - Review of Viking Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: lonely2014
title: Excellent Hotel for price charged.
text:
I found the Viking Hotel very good . The bus stops very near the Hotel.although it is not that far to walk to Stratford Central stat ion where you can get the underground .or many main line trains from Liverpool Street stop at Stratford. and of course buses to many other places.. The very big Westfield Shopping center is also there.
At the Hotel I had a large warm room with windows that opened and I did notice a fan had been put on the wall . Everything was very clean and the towels changed every day,soap was provided , but no toiletries.Yes I Had everything I needed and the breakfast was fine.
Room Tip: My room was on the first floor and very quiet See more room tips
